title: Five-Star English Heritage Retreat in Epicurean Bray
description: Riverside resplendence in the heart of historic Bray awaits with a five-star stay at the boutique Monkey Island Estate, magnificently unfurled upon a private island on the gentle River Thames. This prestigious, heritage-listed luxury retreat has been favoured by royalty and the raucous throughout history, and is the perfect gateway to Englandâ€™s best culinary spots, including Heston Blumenthal's The Fat Duck and Alain Roux's Waterside Inn, both awarded three coveted Michelin stars.
